START_FREE_TRIAL: Do not have a ThoughtSpot account? Start a free trial .
INCORRECT_PASSWORD: Either your username or password is incorrect. Your account may lock out after multiple successive incorrect attempts.
INSERT_TS_VIZ_DESCRIPTION: Click the Browse ThoughtSpot button below to select visualizations from existing Liveboards or Answers.
UPDATE_VIZ_DESCRIPTION: Click the Update all button below to update all ThoughtSpot visualizations in the presentation, or click on Update slide to update ThoughtSpot visualizations on the current slide.
EMPTY_LB_FAVORITES_LIST_MESSAGE_DESCRIPT: You have Liveboards filtered by Favourites. Filter by All to see all your Liveboards.
EMPTY_LB_YOURS_LIST_MESSAGE_DESCRIPTION: You have Liveboards filtered by Yours. Filter by All to see all your Liveboards.
EMPTY_LB_ALL_LIST_MESSAGE_DESCRIPTION: Your Liveboards will be listed here, once you’ve created them.
EMPTY_ANSWER_FAVORITES_LIST_MESSAGE_DESC: When you favourite Answers, they'll display here.
EMPTY_ANSWER_YOURS_LIST_MESSAGE_DESCRIPT: You have Answers filtered by Yours. Filter by All to see all your Answers.
EMPTY_ANSWER_ALL_LIST_MESSAGE_DESCRIPTIO: Whenever you save a search, it will be listed here as an Answer.
INSERT_FAILURE_MESSAGE:
Insert failed, please try again.

 If issue persists please contact ThoughtSpot support
IMAGE_UPDATE_FAILURE_MESSAGE:
Update failed, please try again.

 If issue persists please contact ThoughtSpot support
BROSER_RECCOMENDATION: This plugin is only supported on Google Chrome.
TOKEN_FETCH_FAILED:
Failed to fetch token!

Please relaunch the extension to retry.
PRIVILEGE_REQUIRED: You need the privilege `Can download Data` to access this extension. Please contact your administrator
FREE_TRIAL_DESCRIPTION:
Sign up to a ThoughtSpot free trial account or login to your existing account in order to
start embedding analytics in your application. Once you have signed up to a free trial,
you will be able to log into your account by resuming the ThoughtSpot integration setup
FIRST_CARD_TITLE: Sign up for a free trial
FIRST_CARD_DESCRIPTION:
Sign up to a free 30-day trial of
ThoughtSpot experience
search and AI-driven analytics
directly in your app.
SECOND_CARD_TITLE: Sign in to an existing account
SECOND_CARD_DESCRIPTION:
Sign into your Thoughtspot account
and start embedding natural
language search in your Vercel app
within minutes
MODAL_DESCRIPTION: Once you have created your free trial account, resume the setup to log into your account and connect to your data.
TEST_EMBED_DESCRIPTION:
The code below will embed natural language search, using your ThoughtSpot cluster and the data source created previously in your application.
You can embed other ThoughtSpot components as well such as Liveboards and Answers with our SDK. Find out more here.
Note that this embed will not have user authentication set up.
CODE_SAMPLE_DESCRIPTION:
Finish deploying ThoughtSpot into your application by setting up authentication for your end users. The next step use the Trusted Authentication method.
ThoughtSpot supports several authentication options such as SAML, Open ID, and passthrough authentication to match your deployment preferences.
Learn more about support authentication options here.
TRUSTED_AUTH_DESCRIPTION:
Next, let’s authenticate your users in ThoughtSpot so they can view existing content and ask any question about their data.
ThoughtSpot recommends using the Trusted Authentication method to seamlessly authenticate users into your analytics.
Trusted authentication allows a web application to authenticate a user to ThoughtSpot using login tokens.
More information on Trusted Authentication available here.
Don't have an authentication service? Let’s deploy the Trusted Authentication template to get you started.
USE_POSTGRES_CONNECTION: Use Postgres connection from the project if available
SELECT_PROJECT_HEADING: Select a project to connect to ThoughtSpot
SELECT_PROJECT_SUBTITLE:
First, let’s select a project to add analytics to. ThoughtSpot will automatically create a connection to existing Postgres databases in your project if you wish so.
Otherwise, the next screens will guide you to create or select a connection to a datasource, and select which tables to analyze.
SELECT_TABLES: Select a set of table(s) to analyze data with
SELECT_TABLES_SUBTITLE: ThoughtSpot will create a worksheet(logical views of data used to model datasets in ThoughtSpot)
TRUSTED_AUTH_PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Your token request service should be secured behind your application’s authentication as it will provide a token to access ThoughtSpot to any user. More information about Trusted Authentication is available here
CREATE_CONNECTION_PRIVILEGE_REQUIRED: You need the privilege `Can manage Data` to access this extension. Please contact your administrator
SELECT_PROJECT_ERROR: Please select a project to continue integration
CREATE_CONNECTION_ERROR: Error: There seems to be some issue connecting with your postgres database. Please try restarting the integration or create a new connection. If the issue still persists, please contact ThoughtSpot Support.
CREATE_WORKSHEET_ERROR: Error: There seems to be some issue creating worksheet. Please try restarting the integration. If the issue still persists, please contact ThoughtSpot Support
WHITELIST_CSP_ERROR: Error: You need to be cluster administrator to add your vercel domain to the CSP. Please ask your cluster administrator to add this domain to the CSP.
ADMIN_PRIVILEGE_ISSUE: Error: You need the privilege `Administration` to setup Trusted Authentication. Please contact your administrator to continue the integration further.
SUMMARY_PAGE_DESCRIPTION: Congratulations! You can now embed analytics in your Vercel application using ThoughtSpot Embedding capabilities. You can now:
SUMMARY_PAGE_DOCUMENTATION: To learn how to embed other experiences and get more details, please access ThoughtSpot Vercel Product Documentation.
SUMMARY_PAGE_TRUSTED_AUTH_SERVICE: Securely authenticate your users with your Trusted Authentication service:
TS_USER_ERROR: Error: There seems to be some error fetching the logged in user. Add the user name which you want to login to ThoughtSpot in the code snippet. If the issue still persists, please contact ThoughtSpot support
SUMMARY_PAGE_TEXT: Embed analytics in your app with
SUMMARY_PAGE_DATA_TEXT: Create data visualizations in your ThoughtSpot instance:
SELECT_EXISTING_DATA_SOURCES: Select a existing datasource to embed ThoughtSpot
COPY_TEXT: Copy and paste these values on next page to add environment variables in your trusted auth service -
SUMMARY_PAGE_AUTHENTICATION_TEXT: Remember to secure the Trusted Authentication project listed above behind your app’s authentication.
